div.class: m-0 p-0 d-flex align-items-center justify-content-center o-with-color o-hoverable-button
div.title: Border color

div.class: o-all-sheets position-relative flex-shrink-0 d-flex h-100 me-3
o-selection-statistic text-truncate user-select-none me-4 bg-white rounded shadow

FigureComponent.onClickAnchor: (dirX, dirY, ev) => this.startResize(figure, dirX, dirY, ev)

div.class: o-filter-menu-no-values d-flex align-items-center justify-content-center w-100 h-100
o-grid-add-rows mt-2 ms-2 w-100 d-flex position-relative align-items-center
o-header-group-header position-absolute d-flex align-items-center justify-content-center overflow-hidden
o-group-fold-button user-select-none rounded d-flex align-items-center justify-content-center
o-header-group-main-pane flex-shrink-0 position-relative h-100 w-100 overflow-hidden

input.t-att-class: { 'o-focused' : range.isFocused, 'o-required': props.required, 'o-optional': !props.required, 'o-invalid border-danger position-relative': isInvalid || !range.isValidRange, 'text-decoration-underline': range.isFocused and state.mode === 'select-range' }

div.class: o-cf-drag-handle h-100 position-absolute d-flex align-items-center text-muted
o-checkbox-selection overflow-auto p-3 vh-50 border rounded
div.label: Select all
Add new columns to avoid overwriting cells
